value.title: AI facial recognition: Campaigners and MPs call for ban
value.excerpt: Members of the European Parliament agreed to ban live facial recognition using AI in a draft of its Artificial Intelligence (AI) Act - the EU's landmark legislation categorising different applications of AI according to their harm to the public.

value.title: A Simple Eye Exam Could Explain Why Females Are Underdiagnosed With Autism
value.excerpt: Females are often underdiagnosed with being on the autism spectrum because they often mask their symptoms more successfully than males. The key to understanding why may be in a simple eye exam.

value.title: The Download: Europe vs Chinese EVs, and making AI vision less biased
value.excerpt: Two new papers by researchers at Sony and Meta propose new ways to measure biases in computer vision systems so as to more fully capture the rich diversity of humanity. Developers could use these tools to check the diversity of their data sets, helping lead to better, more diverse training data for AI. Read the full story.
